bram stoker's notes for "dracula afacsimile edition bram stoker annotated and transcribed by robert eighteen bisang and elizabeth miller foreword by michael barsanti
bram stoker's notes for "dracula afacsimile edition bram stoker annotated and transcribed by robert eighteen bisang and elizabeth miller foreword by michael barsanti
reproductions en fac simile des ebauches manuscrites de bram stoker accompagnees de leur transcription ainsi que ses notes tapuscrites

bram stoker initial notes and outlines for his landmark horror novel dracula were auctioned at sotheby in london in 1913 and eventually made their way to the rosenbach museum and library where they are housed today this comprehensive work reproduces the handwritten notes both in facsimile and in annotated transcription it also includes stoker typewritten research notes
